name: CONTRAST (itch) (Daniel-Leal, Murilo Malsan, FabioTer, VergP, IsabellaV2021)
name_original: CONTRAST (itch) (Daniel-Leal, Murilo Malsan, FabioTer, VergP, IsabellaV2021)
description:
DESCRIPTION

This Game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022, where the theme was "duality"

In CONTRAST we walk one side at a time. to turn to the other side, you have to collect this misterious ball that invert the colors of our world. 

Our team recommends to Play this game on Fullscreen for better experience and quality

CONTROLS

=>Z:  PAUSE MENU

=>X: WALK

=> SPACE: JUMP

=> A (Near the Ball): INVERT COLORS
